scripts.bootstrap: concurrently "npm i --prefix services/client" "npm i --prefix services/alerting" "npm i --prefix services/server"  "npm i --prefix services/agent" "npm i --prefix services/collector" "npm i --prefix services/data"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix services/client" "npm run dev --prefix services/alerting" "npm run dev --prefix services/server"  "npm run dev --prefix services/agent" "npm run dev --prefix services/collector" "npm run dev --prefix services/data"
